title: Between
description: An alternate cover for this ASIN can be found here.How far would you go to redeem yourself?After a devastating accident, Lucinda moves to a small town in an attempt to start over. Unable to escape her grief, she is plagued by haunting nightmares. Just as she fears sheâ€™s spiraling out of control, two strangers move into the coastal town. Drawn into a bitter tug-of-war, Lucinda is pulled into a dangerous twist of past and present events. She discovers the two men are locked in not only a battle for her life...but a battle for salvation.
author: Clarissa Johal
